text: YTV Jr. (formerly The Treehouse) was a preschool programming block on YTV, airing from 1994 to 2002. ==History== In 1991, YTV introduced a preschool block with Canadian content, featuring hosts like Katie, Krista, and Todd, along with the Grogs. In 1994, the block was rebranded as The Treehouse, set in a treehouse with various programs. In 1997, Treehouse TV launched, and The Treehouse block received new bumpers and a new set. On September 7, 1998, it became YTV Jr. with new shows and short series, and the block ended in mid-2002. ==Programs== ===The Treehouse=== * The Adventures of Peter Pan (1997–98) * Ballooner Landing (1994–98) * Barney & Friends (1997) * Bertha (1994–95) * Casper and Friends (1995–97) * Lamb Chop's Play-Along (1994–97) * Maya the Bee (1994–95; 1997–98) ===YTV Jr.=== * The Adventures of Dudley the Dragon (1995–2002) * Bananas in Pyjamas (1995–2002) * Blue's Clues (1998–02) * Bob the Builder (2001–02) * Angelina Ballerina (2001–02) * The Fuzzpaws (1998–2002) * The Wind in the Willows (2000–02) ===YTV PlayTime=== * Babar and the Adventures of Badou (2010–11) * George Shrinks (2010–12) * Little Bear (2010–12) ==References== Category:Television programs Category:1994 television series debuts Category:2002 television series endings
